org.jooby

Interface Body.Writer

  • Enclosing class:
    Body

    public static interface Body.Writer
    Utility class to properly write data into the HTTP response body. It provides methods for writing text and bytes efficiently. Clients shouldn't worry about closing the HTTP response body.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Body.Writer.Bytes
      Write bytes to the HTTP Body.
      static interface  Body.Writer.Text
      Write text to the HTTP Body and apply application/request charset.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bytes(Body.Writer.Bytes bytes)
      Write bytes into the HTTP response body and close the resources.
      Charset charset() 
      void text(Body.Writer.Text text)
      Write text into the HTTP response body using the charset() and close the resources.

    • Method Detail

      • charset

        Charset charset()
        Returns:
        A charset.

      • text

        void text(@Nonnull
          Body.Writer.Text text)
   throws Exception
        Write text into the HTTP response body using the charset() and close the resources. It applies the application/request charset.
        Parameters:
        text - A text strategy.
        Throws:
        Exception - When the operation fails.
